function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of Covid-19 through IoT devices and technologies","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission and infection if devices are not properly managed and sanitized","Mitigation":"Implement strict sanitization protocols for IoT devices, enforce regular maintenance checks, and educate users on proper use","Technologies":"Sanitization systems, remote maintenance tools, user education platforms","People":"Healthcare workers, patients, general public","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, IoT device manufacturers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Security and privacy issues related to IoT and Cognitive Radio (CR) technology","Impact":"Risk of data breaches, unauthorized access, and privacy violations leading to misinformation and compromised patient data","Mitigation":"Use encryption and secure authentication protocols, conduct regular security audits, and ensure compliance with data privacy regulations","Technologies":"Encryption tools, secure authentication systems, security audit software","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, data privacy experts","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, IoT and CR technology developers, data privacy regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Reliance on wearable devices for monitoring patients and potential inaccuracies","Impact":"Risk of inaccurate readings and unreliable data leading to misdiagnosis and improper patient care","Mitigation":"Regular calibration and testing of wearable devices, cross-referencing data with traditional medical assessments, and training healthcare professionals to interpret wearable device data","Technologies":"Calibration tools, data cross-referencing algorithms, healthcare professional training platforms","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, medical researchers","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, wearable device manufacturers, medical training institutions"}]}
